Scalar¶

class blsct.Scalar(obj=None)¶

Wrapper for the finite field object provided by the mcl library (mclBnFr).

This class provides finite field operations over the scalar field used in the BLS12-381 curve.

classmethod default_obj() → Any¶

Return a default scalar object

static from_int(n: int) → Self¶

Create a scalar from an integer

static random() → Self¶

Generate a random scalar

to_hex() → str¶

Convert the scalar to a hexadecimal string

to_int() → int¶

Convert the scalar to an integer

value() → Any¶

Return the underlying mcl_scalar object
